detectors.description:

	- DragonsETH(mainContract).createDragon(msg.sender,block.number + timeToBorn,0,0,0,0) (reorder_contracts_2_3/test2908.sol#399)

	- wallet.transfer(mainValue) (reorder_contracts_2_3/test2908.sol#385)
	- referer.transfer(mainValue / 2) (reorder_contracts_2_3/test2908.sol#388)
	- wallet.transfer(mainValue - mainValue / 2) (reorder_contracts_2_3/test2908.sol#389)
	- referer.transfer(mainValue * 3 / 10) (reorder_contracts_2_3/test2908.sol#391)
	- wallet.transfer(mainValue - mainValue * 3 / 10) (reorder_contracts_2_3/test2908.sol#392)
	- wallet.transfer(mainValue) (reorder_contracts_2_3/test2908.sol#396)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdSaleDragonPrice (reorder_contracts_2_3/test2908.sol#401)
	- soldDragons (reorder_contracts_2_3/test2908.sol#400)
CrowdSaleDragonETH.fallback has external calls inside a loop: "DragonsETH(mainContract).createDragon(msg.sender,block.number + timeToBorn,0,0,0,0)" (reorder_contracts_2_3/test2908.sol#399)
